name: Quote Source
author: Raptor

sections.description: Quote your article source at the end of your post
sections.installation:
Automatic method

  1. Find this plugin in WordPress plugin browser
  2. Click install
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. In a “Add New” post or page, add up to 3 URLs to quote

or

Manual method

  1. Download, unzip and upload to your WordPress plugins directory (/wp-content/plugins/ directory)
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. In a “Add New” post or page, add up to 3 URLs to quote
sections.faq:
How to report a bug / request a feature ?

Send an email to findme@raptor.hk
sections.changelog:
1.0.6

  • Tested with WordPress version 3.2.1
  • Worked with most themes
  • Redesigned the option page
  • Simplified display layout of single quote (thanks Sam)

1.0.5

  • Tested with WordPress version 3.1.1 and 3.1.2
  • Optimized display layout of single quote
  • Bugfix

1.0.4

  • Source title is now optional (thanks Alexander Burgemeester)
  • Bugfix

1.0.3

  • Source URL is now optional (thanks Loris)
  • Source Title is required in order to display under posts
  • You can now fill in sources in any order
  • Source code cleanup

1.0.2

  • Support WordPress 3.1
  • Added option page (Plugins > Quote Source)
  • Provide options for Look and Feel, and source show-up position (thanks Steven)
  • Bugfix

1.0.1

  • Added a horizontal rule above the source list (thanks David Perednia)
  • Add one more screenshot

1.0

  • Initial release
